Room.Name: Amberton Lane
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along Amberton Lane, east of the Necropolis.
Room.LongDescription: Amberton Lane, if it continued past Kafkarn Way, forms the eastern boundry of the Necropolis. Due to some strange magic from the Mages of Keslar, a large hill was pulled out from the earth and severed Amberton Lane into two separate roads. The Mages of Keslar are the strongest and most powerful of the creatures in Oceancrest not directly affiliated with the undead.
